00016 #include "RCBuffer.h"
00017 #include <CTFrame_m.h>
00018 #include <TTEScheduler.h>
00019 #include "TTEApplicationBase.h"
00020 
00021 namespace TTEthernetModel {
00022 
00023 Define_Module( RCBuffer);
00024 
00025 RCBuffer::RCBuffer()
00026 {
00027     bagExpired = true;
00028     timerMessage = new SchedulerTimerEvent("RCBuffer Scheduler Event", TIMER_EVENT);
00029 }
00030 
00031 RCBuffer::~RCBuffer()
00032 {
00033     cancelEvent(timerMessage);
00034     delete timerMessage;
00035 }
00036 
00037 void RCBuffer::initialize()
00038 {
00039     timerMessage->setDestinationGate(gate("schedulerIn"));
00040 
00041     //Update displaystring
00042     setIsEmpty(true);
00043 }
00044 
00045 void RCBuffer::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00046 {
00047     Buffer::handleMessage(msg);
00048 
00049     if (msg->arrivedOn("in"))
00050     {
00051         if (bagExpired)
00052         {
00053             cMessage *outgoingMessage = dequeue();
00054             bagExpired = false;
00055             numReset = 0;
00056             //Send Message
00057             for (std::list<cGate*>::iterator gate = destinationGates.begin(); gate != destinationGates.end(); ++gate)
00058             {
00059                 sendDirect(outgoingMessage->dup(), *gate);
00060             }
00061             if(gate("out")->isConnected()){
00062                 send(outgoingMessage->dup(),"out");
00063             }
00064             recordPacketSent();
00065             delete outgoingMessage;
00066         }
00067     }
00068 
00069     if (msg->arrivedOn("schedulerIn") && msg->getKind() == TIMER_EVENT)
00070     {
00071         cMessage *outgoingMessage = dequeue();
00072         if (outgoingMessage)
00073         {
00074             bagExpired = false;
00075             numReset = 0;
00076             //Send Message
00077             for (std::list<cGate*>::iterator gate = destinationGates.begin(); gate != destinationGates.end(); ++gate)
00078             {
00079                 sendDirect(outgoingMessage->dup(), *gate);
00080             }
00081             recordPacketSent();
00082             delete outgoingMessage;
00083         }
00084         else
00085         {
00086             bagExpired = true;
00087             getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2", 0, "");
00088         }
00089     }
00090 }
00091 
00092 void RCBuffer::handleParameterChange(const char* parname){
00093     Buffer::handleParameterChange(parname);
00094 
00095     timerMessage->setTimer(par("bag").doubleValue());
00096 }
00097 
00098 void RCBuffer::resetBag()
00099 {
00100     Enter_Method("resetBag()");
00101     //This is the moment when the message was transmitted execute transmit callbacks if there are some
00102     for(std::map<TTEApplicationBase*,Callback*>::const_iterator iter = transmitCallbacks.begin();
00103             iter != transmitCallbacks.end(); ++iter){
00104         iter->first->executeCallback(iter->second);
00105     }
00106 
00107     //Set icon:
00108     getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2", 0, "status/hourglass");
00109 
00110     numReset++;
00111     if (numReset == destinationGates.size())
00112     {
00113         //Reregister scheduler
00114         TTEScheduler *tteScheduler = (TTEScheduler*) getParentModule()->getSubmodule("tteScheduler");
00115         tteScheduler->registerEvent(timerMessage);
00116     }
00117 }
00118 
00119 } //namespace
